title: them feels when you aren't good enough for your partner :\
body:
You know how when you hook a guy who is just so amazingly nice and you KNOW you don't deserve him but he sticks to you like glue and you become clueless as to why he sticks around? Jealousy hits you on the daily and you accuse him of being unfaithful because you know in your right mind that he is too good for you? He puts in way more effort than any previous boyfriend and actually makes you feel special and wanted. You sit around all day and wonder why he is still there by your side not leaving you for other girls who you think are better. He tries to reassure you that he ONLY likes you and ONLY wants to be with YOU and can't think of any other girl in the same way. Do you fellow boys and girls ever feel like this? 

Because I don't. I'm way too good for my boyfriend and I settled for him so I would know he is always going to be faithful because he could never do better.  I also learned that he is actually a good guy and because I gave him this chance I love him equally. Sure I am banging hot and he is so banging not but it's really fine :) 

Please share your relationships and how bad they are compared to mine. Thanks

replies.body: Jill is always by my side and I know she'll never leave me. Even if I lose her in an accident I can use her twin sister whenever I want.
her twin sister lily?

Bit of an ego you got there at the end :P {{champion:119}} 


My relationships in the past have typically ended for some really stupid reasons, my most recent one was due to an argument over history and how things would look very different if the ones who lost wars were the winners instead.
sounds interesting

Accept it. before you push him away.. I had a relationship where we both thought that and eventually it turned into a very push and pull relationship.. I'd do something... She'd take 2 steps back and I'd ask why the hell she is putting the walls up.. Then I'd do something cause she's pushing away but she still wants me (I was meant to read her mind) and eventually we kept pushing and pulling until it really affected us in our work and health. We split because I eventually was out of my mind trying to figure out what the hell to do.. 

Accept what he is and be the girl he wants/needs. Accept compliments accept the way it is. If he has feelings for you then that is that. Don't f@#$@#$ question it because that turns your bad thoughts into reality. Just accept it. Trust him. True love has no boundaries. Hell i totally had crazy standards when I was younger  (now I realize.) In this one night that I met this girl... we fell in love and I totally thought she was everything I wasn't looking for.. But we fell deep in love like holy.. she drove me crazy in my head with love. Just accept it, if you need a honest dude to help you out add me. I'm not a creep, I just have had experience

If an amazing guy TELLS you that he doesn't think like that then he obviously wants you. If he's in it for the long run LISTEN TO HIM, he's probably pouring his heart out to you... Step back, see the big picture. Please don't be like a lot of other girls and drive your guy insane.. For the love of Doublelift.. Hell, I even cried to my girlfriend sometimes. She's the only one who saw me cry.. They were real tears for her
Just read the second paragraph......... Screw you haha who even does this. You sound like you're crazy

Just wanted to say your advice is helpful anyway. 

I've been stuck in a rut loving someone who's already told me to move on because he "just wants us to be friends", yet whilst we're friends says and does things that contradict his words. You don't call somebody who is strictly a friend your "baby",  or casually ask if you could sleep with her, do you? It was acceptable when we were together.. that was over a year ago. I wish I'd taken his word and flew with it, not have tried to read into his actions for more. 

The reality is we can't have a normal friendship. I'm still in love with him. I tried, and I can't get over it. Especially when he continually crosses the boundaries he himself set. Maybe it would've been possible if he'd been a more responsible friend and recognised how I felt, maybe not.. I wish he at least understood.

Just remember actions speak far louder than words.. In this situation it might be wiser to see his actions rather than his words. If you aren't together because HE is choosing he doesn't want you: then that's that: he doesn't want you.  Right now I'm guessing you're his booty call. Pretty sad. 

You are the one who knows your worth.. Maybe stick up for yourself. If he wants you he will come back. If he doesn't come back.. keep walking. He knows you still love him. Don't let yourself be manipulated.

 Yeah me and my ex tried to be friends.. We still loved eachother and hung out "as friends" for 2 years.., no sex, no kissing or anything you'd do in a relationship.. just loving eachother and cherishing the others company., laying down and hugging was intimate enough.. One thing you should do.. Have one last talk with him.. Go see him face to face.. Ask what he wants. Tell him how you feel and ask him if he feels the same way.. You owe it to yourself.

The first step to solving a problem is realizing that there is one. I literally  don't have to say anything (in a perfect world) because you've already identified the problem.. You've told me what is wrong. Now tell yourself what you just told me. I'm glad I could help though. Good luck, friend
Go post something related plz, this overfill of random relationship crap is doing my head in

http://puu.sh/hZJNY/a5bd2a1d76.png


Most viewed most commented on. You prefer to be seeing the dead threads? Ok newfag
I agree ^

this board is misc
that means it doesn't have to be league related.

I was unaware that these forums were a site to post up personal things about dating and what people have done to there dates/Loved ones.
Man Ive been playing league wrong for 4 years HOW HAVE I NOT NOTICED!

Well this is the Miscellaneous section, the sole purpose for it's existence is for shit unrelated to LoL. If people could only post LoL related things here the already teeny community would lose interest and leave because most LoL posts are just pure QQ or name and shames.

That's what I like about it I can post completely random shit here whenever I feel like and not have it removed, wish they would of called it GD tho instead of Miscellaneous it doesn't exactly roll of the tongue.
I miss GD :(
Funny thing is that if Riot had of just named this GD there probably would of been more people who stayed.
yeah I think so too XD
One girl I dated for 3 years, found out she was a crazy clinger. Cheated and dumped her, she never found out about the cheating so it's all good.
After 3 years you discovered she was a crazy clinger............................... ok
Don't be in a relationship, do not pass GO and do not collect $200

> [{quoted}](name=mrs styles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rNpErEdA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-25T05:54:19.540+0000)
>
> My relationship sucks... I recently started dating this guy. He made ME ask him out - how UNromantic, right? He makes me cry at least twice a week and flirts with different girls every 4 to 5 hours. One time, this other girl was his snapchat best friend (WHILE WE WERE SEEING EACH OTHER, WTF). To emphasize the situation, he took this beautiful girl out on a date and they played pool. Like pool is one of the most cliche things ever where like the guy has a chance to like grab the girl's hips and "teach her how to play". Do you know the pain I have to go through while I'm at home STUDYING? It sucks. He basically flirts with every female. Whenever he meets a girl on CS:GO (even if they're on the enemy team) he instantly adds and gets to know them. Like what the hell YOU HAVE A GIRLFRIEND FAGGOT. To make matters worse, you may think he's kind regardless of his womanizing behaviour, but you're wrong. He is rude and mean and yells at you if you ask "Where are you going?" or "Did he talk to you in a condescending tone?". And he also rages at you if you accidentally over-peel him as the ad-carry in League of Legends. My least favourite thing about him, which annoys the SHIT out of me every time... Is that he copies Imaqtpie way too much. It's like he's not even himself anymore? It's filthy. He ALWAYS says "I ain't no BITCH" in that tone and it's hella annoying - Makes me want to punch an innocent animal. Like that's how annoyed I get. Also, he never lets me invite my friends to like normals or ARAMS. I duno why. But ya, he's hot and I like him tons. What should I do?

Dont post on the internet saying your relationship being soooo bad but you love him soooo much and expect help. But here is your case  

*Stockholm syndrome, or capture-bonding, is a psychological phenomenon in which hostages express empathy and sympathy and have positive feelings toward their captors, sometimes to the point of defending and identifying with the captors.*
Can you stop bullying me? I'm going through a rough time right now in my life, especially with my boyfriend.. I don't need this shit omfg.

> [{quoted}](name=mrs styles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rNpErEdA,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-25T06:04:20.011+0000)
>
> Can you stop bullying me? I'm going through a rough time right now in my life, especially with my boyfriend.. I don't need this shit omfg.

Have you considered leaving him? there is no need to stay in a relationship like this everyone deserves better.
Hmm maybe. But sometimes he calls me pretty and says I'm banging beautiful even if I look horrible with like four pimples. It's the little things that make me second-guess my life choices, ya feel?

> [{quoted}](name=mrs styles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rNpErEdA,comment-id=00010000000000010000,timestamp=2015-05-25T06:13:42.503+0000)
>
> Hmm maybe. But sometimes he calls me pretty and says I'm banging beautiful even if I look horrible with like four pimples. It's the little things that make me second-guess my life choices, ya feel?

Words are cheap, respect and personality are what matters most any asshole can speak nice, I'm not saying he is one just saying that a few "I love you" and "You are beautiful" comments here and there aren't worth much if they treat you bad the rest of the time.

> [{quoted}](name=mrs styles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rNpErEdA,comment-id=00010000000000010000,timestamp=2015-05-25T06:13:42.503+0000)

I do feel ya, but he says those things just to keep you. He knows how women work from your desc. But my guess and everyone on heres guess is he isnt for you
Accurate as hell. ALL GUYS ARE THE SAME RIGHT?

nope. Thats like saying all females are bitches and feminist and lie about the pain they go through during labor (labor isn't that bad, i survived) . Can't define a person by their gender. Unfortunately their are some idiots in this world.

my bad if you were being sarcastic lol i wasn't sure haha
It was sarcasm.

> [{quoted}](name=mrs styles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rNpErEdA,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-25T06:04:20.011+0000)

I don't need a freaking therapist/counselor.. Can you not tell me how to live my life? x. 

You're saying that I have Stockholm Syndrome, which theoretically, is not an accurate portrayal of my life. I've never even heard of that term, except that it's a One Direction song from their latest album, 'Four'.

Omfg this bitch is crazy, i said maybe go see one SO YOU DONT GET FUCKED BY SOME CUNT EVEN MORE

She is naive. I'm guessing just a little teen.. Let her be trash xD Pretty fkn sad that some people can't be helped. Ohwell 
"her life"
You ask for advice from the internet then reject it straight away. So fucken ignorant.

Shallow. You're trash. You like him because he's hot? Well that's why he's an asshole. Get gud at life.. Seriously no sympathy from your last 2 sentences. The first step to solving a problem is realizing that there is one. A real woman is content. A real woman doesn't NEED a man. A man is simply a want. You just want him whether he treats you like shit or not. Are you worth better or are you settling for this asshole? You're the one with the closed mind. Your restrictions are in your head. Think outside the box.. how old are you?
HOLY NO. He's hot because I like him :) I'm 17 sista
You bring dishonor to your family

I'll give you a 1/10 for effort, but that's the best I can do.

Post your bait somewhere else.
I'm not baiting
